CustomField.inlineHelpText: Nominate preferred position toward ownership of intellectual property created under the project (Project IP). If Project IP is owned by the other party, we can request rights to use the Project IP. This may change upon Agreement finalisation.
CustomField.label: IP Position

value.fullName: Owned by other organisation with rights for My Uni to use for research and teaching
value.label: Owned by other organisation with rights for My Uni to use for research and teaching

value.fullName: Owned by other organisation – no rights to My Uni to use
value.label: Owned by other organisation – no rights to My Uni to use

value.fullName: Owned by other organisation with rights for JCU to use for research and teaching
value.label: Owned by other organisation with rights for JCU to use for research and teaching

value.fullName: Owned by other organisation – no rights to JCU to use
value.label: Owned by other organisation – no rights to JCU to use
